sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { removeProductFromCart } from '../features/cartSlice' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' const CardTemplate = ({product}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() if (product) return 'loading' return (
{product.productName}
{`${product.productPrice}/- Rs`}
dispatch(removeProductFromCart(product.id))}/>
) } export default CardTemplate
